TopicTitle: Return to Space Center button Confirmation dialog box

Articles.Content:
Anyone know of a mod that adds a confirmation dialog box or another similar option to both space center buttons. I have tried searching but have not been able to find anything yet.

Essentially what I keep running into is for some reason on occasion I hit Space center instead of revert flight, every time I do so I realize the mistake as I'm doing it so a small delay would completely stop this.

If anyone knows of a mod like this I would appreciate the info.
